trans-unit.source: Defines the writer, resource, print ticket, and package relationship settings that are associated with a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Define la configuraci贸n de sistema de escritura, recurso, solicitud de impresi贸n (PrintTicket) y relaci贸n de paquete asociada a un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy" />.

trans-unit.target: Documento [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] al que se aplica la directiva de empaquetado.

trans-unit.source: The order in which to interleave document elements.
trans-unit.target: El orden en el que se intercalan los elementos de documento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy" /> class with a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> and specified interleave order.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy" /> con un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> especificado y en el orden de intercalaci贸n especificado.

trans-unit.source: The resource identifier of the color context.

trans-unit.target: La solicitud de impresi贸n (PrintTicket) que se va a almacenar como parte del documento [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Stores a specified <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> as part of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Almacena un <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> especificado como parte del <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Este m茅todo no valida ni modificar especificado `printTicket` para un determinado <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Si es necesario, utilice el <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> m茅todo para crear un <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> que es espec铆fico de la <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> y es v谩lido para una impresora determinada.

trans-unit.source: Prepares to commit the current page to the output store.
trans-unit.target: Realiza los preparativos para confirmar la p谩gina actual al almac茅n de salida.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the resource to associate with the current page.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] del recurso que se va a asociar a la p谩gina actual.

trans-unit.target: Agrega <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> con un nombre especificado que asocia un recurso especificado a la p谩gina actual.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the restricted font to associate with the current document.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] de la fuente restringida que se va a asociar al documento actual.
